trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_SEQ_00<tab>Falkbryda would summon you to action.

TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_SEQ_01<tab>Falkbryda asks you to infiltrate the Serpent's Tongue and use makeshift bombs to destroy the crystals, so that the Sahagin will have no means by which to summon Leviathan.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_SEQ_02<tab>You have blown the crystals into a thousand thousand fragments. Report your success to Falkbryda.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_SEQ_03<tab>Falkbryda thanks you for your part in preserving the peace. Let Radolf know that the Sahagin advance has been halted.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_SEQ_04<tab>Now that the Sahagin menace has abated, the Scions may seek to remedy the other maladies of the realm.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_TODO_00<tab>Use the makeshift bombs to destroy the boxes of crystals.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_TODO_01<tab>Report to Falkbryda.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_TODO_02<tab>Report to Radolf.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_FALKBRYDA_000_000<tab>The Serpent Reavers leave us no choice. The risk of the crystals falling into Sahagin hands is too great for us to remain idle. It comes time to act.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_FALKBRYDA_000_001<tab>So many are the crystals that we have no means of recovering them. We can only hope to destroy them.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_FALKBRYDA_000_002<tab>While losing the crystals is regrettable, we have far more to lose should Leviathan be summoned.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_FALKBRYDA_000_003<tab>Our forces will bombard the Reavers, drawing them out of their den so that you might slip in with these makeshift bombs and destroy the crystals.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_FALKBRYDA_000_004<tab>The Serpent's Tongue lies beyond Tidegate and the Sahagin Landbase, at the very heart of the enemy encampment.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_FALKBRYDA_000_005<tab>Our comrades will do their utmost to distract the enemy, but the explosions will surely draw the attention of nearby forces. Be prepared to defend yourself.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_FALKBRYDA_000_020<tab>Our triumphant hero returns! And I imagine it will be some time before the Serpent Reavers and the Sahagin rear their ugly heads again.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_FALKBRYDA_000_021<tab>More importantly, we needn't worry about Leviathan rearing his head.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_FALKBRYDA_000_022<tab>The Maelstrom, and indeed all of Limsa Lominsa, owes you a debt of gratitude. And please send my regards to Radolf!
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_RADOLF_000_030<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, so good of you to return. Tales of your deeds precede you!

TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_RADOLF_000_031<tab>Knowing Limsa Lominsa lay in good hands allowed us to tend to matters of import elsewhere, but I am relieved to have you back with us all the same. Much work remains for the realm.
TEXT_GAIUSC811_01035_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>You sense a hostile presence!
